text: >FYI Open Hardware Summit is happening in Portland for the first time ever this year. It's a great conference run by independent artists who work with hardware. They're looking for speakers, and not just on hardware topics, but open culture in general. <https://twitter.com/ohsummit/status/716324229717827587>
